hovers: ${'<col=66B2FF>Claws of Guthix: <col=C266FF>Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Mind rune') / 4, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) + '  <col=FFFF88>Price: 400g  > ' + (400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Mind rune') / 4, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) < 1000 ? 400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Mind rune') / 4, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) + 'g' : floor((400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Mind rune') / 4, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + '  <col=FF4D4D>Power: 20  '}

hovers.condition: inv_qty('Zamorak staff') >= 1 && inv_qty('Fire rune') >= 2 && inv_qty('Air rune') >= 2 && inv_qty('Blood rune') >= 1
hovers: ${'<col=66B2FF>Flames of Zamorak: <col=C266FF>Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Fire rune') / 2, inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) + '  <col=FFFF88>Price: 400g  > ' + (400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Fire rune') / 2, inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) < 1000 ? 400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Fire rune') / 2, inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) + 'g' : floor((400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Fire rune') / 2, inv_qty('Air rune') / 2, inv_qty('Blood rune'))) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + '  <col=FF4D4D>Power: 20  '}

hovers.condition: inv_qty('Chaos rune') >= 2 && inv_qty('Earth rune') >= 1 && inv_qty('Air rune') >= 2
hovers: ${'<col=66B2FF>Crumble Undead: <col=C266FF>Casts: ' + floor(min(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2, inv_qty('Earth rune'), inv_qty('Air rune') / 2)) + '  <col=FFFF88>Price: 400g  > ' + (400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2, inv_qty('Earth rune'), inv_qty('Air rune') / 2)) < 1000 ? 400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2, inv_qty('Earth rune'), inv_qty('Air rune') / 2)) + 'g' : floor((400 * floor(min(inv_qty('Chaos rune') / 2, inv_qty('Earth rune'), inv_qty('Air rune') / 2)) / 100) / 10) + 'k') + '  <col=FF4D4D>Power: 15 '}
